attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The voluntary National Service will be open to all 18-25 year olds.  The Volunteers will serve for 2 years in a role of their choice, including non-active military, community and charitable service.  No military volunteers will be allowed to leave the U.K. for active service.  Voluntary National Service could provide educational and vocational training that leads to internationally recognised qualifications.  Volunteers will be entitled to a salary.
